title: Twitter deletes Guj BJP's post after outrage; Had showed 'Muslims' as terrorists - Hindustan Times
content:
1. Twitter deletes Guj BJP's post after outrage; Had showed 'Muslims' as terrorists  Hindustan Times
  2. Row Over Cartoon By BJP On Ahmedabad Blasts Verdict, Twitter Removes It  NDTV
  3. Why Twitter took down Gujarat BJP's cartoon 'hailing' Ahmedabad Blasts Verdict  Hindustan Times
  4. For the BJP, the Muslim is Not Just the Message, It is the Only Message  The Wire
  5. India has become safer since 2014  The Indian Express
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: Twitter has removed Gujarat BJP's 'anti-Muslim' tweet depicting Muslim men hanging from the noose. After the massive outrage on social media, Twitter has now taken down the controversial tweet on the grounds of violating its rules. Gujarat BJP had posted the tweet in response to a special court's verdict on Feb 18, announcing death sentence to 38 convicts and life imprisonment to 11 others in the 2008 Ahmedabad serial blasts case. Watch this video to know more.
